message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to introduce you to this product. While it has its benefits, I want to be transparent with you - I've seen better products in our inventory. However, this one still meets our quality standards and might be a good fit for your needs. The price is $10000. I'll let you decide if it's worth the investment.
